internships.empty_state: No internships found matching your criteria
internships.items.azersun.description: 3-month paid internship, 5 days/week (09:00–18:00), lunch included, can be extended and may result in a job offer depending on performance.
internships.items.aga_ai.description: Ferrum Kapital JSC's 3-month 'AI Internship Program' gives students their first career experience in Automation and Digitalization.
internships.items.unibank.description: 3-month internship, introduction to card business and operations, participation in real projects.
internships.items.pashapay.description: Employment contract with a 6-day/week, 5-hour work schedule, fixed salary and bonus system, and the opportunity to gain experience and develop skills in sales and customer service within a professional team.
internships.items.birbank.description: The Performance QA Intern role involves preparing, executing, and analyzing performance tests.
internships.items.azercell.description: In the market research intern role, you will be responsible for collecting data through surveys, interviews, and analytics, analyzing it, and presenting the results to the team and management.
